programme.title: 叛逆战队 Devil's Blues - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) With the arrival of the new century, crime is constantly manifesting itself in different ways. The new era brings forth prosperity and at the same time, a host of new deviant patterns from the young generation. Traditional methodology to fight crime is no longer effective in these times of swift changes. The police hence decide to set up a task force specializing in new-age criminology, getting the youths themselves to combat youth crimes: the Devil Drifters team is born! (重)故事讲述叛逆战队统帅狄军一直带领着战队以非一般的办案方式与超乎常规的手段，破获了不少一般警察不能应付的另类案件。狄军一直尽忠职守，但由于环境关系，他办案时所采用的非常手段却未能得到警方高层的支持和谅解，反而惹来了常规警员的非议与否定，而狄军在一次行动中，更落得有队员惨死的收场，令高层下令解散战队，幸而在狄军据理力争之下，终于换来一次证明自己的最后机会，上级决定派人到战队监察，为期三个月，藉此决定战…….

programme.title: 客人来咯! Please Be My Guest! Sr 2 - EP 1

(重)(大结局)新传媒首部超过百集的电视剧，也是去年红星大奖大赢家，囊括最佳男女主角、男女配角和最高收视率电视剧。故事围绕在荷兰村卖椰浆饭的莫家、开洗衣店的林家、饮食集团恶霸杨家。他们在荷兰村成长、做生意、谈恋爱。碰到各种各样的问题，有开心、有失意、有阻难，但在亲情的力量中，一切都引刃而解。.

programme.title: 法网天后 Legal Eagles - EP 3

(PG-些许性相关语)(重)Ella暗示美琪，自己已经怀有身孕，美琪万念惧灰，决定离婚。回国后，她马上带着女儿Olive离开了家，住到母亲彩珍家。美琪将自己的离婚案交由安生处理，见到事务所内一众忙碌的专业人士，令她十分向往。.

Mei Qi is shocked when she hears that Jun Hao is only willing to pay one dollar for alimony and he wants the custody of Olive. 美琪希望君豪不要跟她争女儿的抚养权，君豪答应。不料他出尔反尔，将离婚案交给Ella的义兄家明处理。家明代表君豪，与安生和美琪商谈离婚条件，表示君豪只肯付象征性1元的赡养费，还要争夺Olive的抚养权，令美琪大受打击。.

However, Xiu Ying and Shun Tian expressed that they have no intention to stay with the two of them and do not want obstruct them from starting their own family. Xiao Yi and Xin Xin are disappointed that things went back to their original state. How will they solve this dilemma that will make everyone happy? (重)（大结局）孝义和心心计划搬进新居，带秀英和顺天去看新家，岂料两人却不约而同地表示不跟两人同住了，更不会阻碍两人组织新家庭。孝义和心心感叹两人绕了大半个圈子，又回到原点，他们该如何解决问题呢？.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste of Life - EP 305
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 心点心 Heart To Heart - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Liang Gui bumps into Feng Zhu, but mistakes Feng Zhu for Feng Zhu's mother instead, asking her how Feng Zhu was doing. Feng Zhu was offended and angry that if not for Liang Gui and Tian Hua, Wen Guang and her would not be forced to live overseas for the past years. Liang Gui felt guilty, revealing that he lied to Tian Hua about Wen Guang not being Tian Hua's son at that time as he was emotionally affected, not being able to win Feng Zhu's heart. Feng Zhu realised she had misunderstood Tian Hua. (PG)(重)梁贵再次偶遇凤珠，却把她当成凤珠的妈妈，追问凤珠过得好不好。凤珠气结，怒斥因为他和天华，害得他们母子被迫在异乡度过几十年。梁贵自责，自爆他当年因为追不到凤珠，心理不平衡，才对天华谎称文广是他儿子。凤珠才知误会了天华。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 75
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 18
programme.desc: (Part 2) Yongzheng wants Li'an to groom Weijia to be the company's successor. Yi'ai hopes to learn from Li'an as well. However, her main reason for doing so is to spend more time with Li'an. (PG)(第18集下)永正希望立安担任围家的导师，培训围家日后接管公司。以爱举手要跟着学习，其实想与立安增加见面时间。.

programme.title: 学长学姐好样的！ Thumbs Up! Senior - EP 7
programme.desc: After two years of studying in Paris, the young boss opens a pastry shop in a neighbourhood housing estate. However, he has no idea on how to attract more nearby customers to his shop and how can he decorate his shop. Will the seniors from NTU able to help him solve his problems? 曾远赴法国巴黎学艺2年，之后在邻里组屋区开设法式甜点店的年轻老板，对于如何吸引邻里居民来光顾以及店面的陈设，都一筹莫展。来自南大的学长和学姐，将如何伸出援手来帮忙呢？.

programme.title: 攻星计 After The Stars - EP 21
programme.desc: Jiang Han decides to blacklist Zi Yi, causing Zi Yi to face difficulties. Tian Ai persuades Zhang Lan to patch up with Jiang Han, Tian Ai and Guo Yu arrange for the two to meet but Zhang Lan splashes her tea on Jiang Han, expressing that she will never forgive him. The hatred incurred between the two grows deeper. (PG)江汉决定封杀姿意。姿意面对困境，天爱劝张岚与江汉和解。天爱和国瑜安排两人见面，不料张岚竟将茶水泼向江汉，表示到死都不会原谅他，两人结怨更深。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 罪案心理小组X Visible Lies - EP 2
programme.desc: Xu Lang is attacked in a bar during his investigation of the writers' deaths. His teammates find out that the media company that is in-charge of the bar's advertisements could be related to the writers' deaths. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)徐朗在调查网络作家谋杀案的过程中在一间酒吧被袭击。组员们查到替酒吧制作宣传广告的传媒集团似乎跟网络作家们的死有关。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 11
programme.desc: Wen Chao took the Four Clans to find the demon turtle. When the demon turtle surfaced, despicable Wen Chao quickly retreated and even cut off the escape rope. The injured Wei Wuxian and Lan Zhan were trapped in the cave. (PG-些许暴力画面)温晁带着四大家族找妖兽玄武。妖兽玄武浮出水面，卑鄙的温晁赶紧撤退还割断了逃生的绳索，受伤的魏无羡与蓝湛被困洞内。.

programme.title: 破茧而出 Metamorphosis - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Power struggle within a notorious mafia gang led to the murder of several triad leaders. Before detectives Ouyang Li (Chen Hanwei) and Dylan (Terence Cao ) get to the killer, he was murdered. A series of chain murders occur where the dead are criminals. This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

programme.title: 真的不一样 Fake It So Real - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) The textiles we use daily are made from textile fibres. Do you know the clothes you wear are made from natural or man-made fibres? Lee Teng is at the 100 year-old ranch and wool mill in Australia to introduce the natural wool fibre and in Thailand to take a look at the production of man-made fibres. (重)生活中使用的纺织品，是由纺织纤维所制成。你知道你身上穿的衣服，是由天然纤维，还是人造纤维纺织而成的？李腾将飞往澳州百年牧场及羊毛纺织厂，为观众介绍天然羊毛纤维。他也会前往泰国，见识人造纤维的生产过程。.

programme.title: 开门见餐 Home Dining - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Karen Ng had worked as a home cook for Canadian High Commissioner for 10 years. Since then, she has been hosting dinner for her friends and relatives at home. What would she prepare for the guests tonight? Menu includes Prawn Chicken Cup, Scotch Egg, Pakistani Spicy Chicken Rice, Pan-fried Fish Fillet with Salsa and etc. Sounds interesting? How do they taste like? Let's find out in "Home Dining"! (重)黄碧燕曾担任三届加拿大驻本地大使的私人厨师长达10年。离开大使馆加入保险行业之前，她就已经常在家设宴款待朋友，之后也因厨艺深获好评而开始为友人的家宴当厨师，至今超过15年。她今天为宾客精心烹调的料理，包括了鲜虾鸡丁沙拉、苏格兰蛋、巴基斯坦辣香鸡和香煎多利鱼等。想知道滋味如何，欢迎你一起来“开门见餐"！.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 56
programme.desc: (R) Yi Yi recovers from her fever and is out drinking. Ya Zhou tries to stop her but gets a tongue lashing instead. Seeing Zhen Hui in the vicinity, Ya Zhou leaves Yi Yi to him and instructs him to take good care of her. (PG)(重)振辉和玉叶感情陷入低潮，他落寞之际，遇见亚洲和依依。原来依依高烧刚退，就跑出来买啤酒喝。亚洲要拉她回去，反被她骂了一顿。依依跌倒，振辉出手相助，被依依缠着不放，亚洲顺水推舟把依依推给振辉，要振辉照顾她。.

programme.title: 小城花样多 Small Town Surprises - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) This week's Small Town Surprises brings us down the memory lane! Our Lee siblings relive their parents nostalgic childhood as they compete in a gasing challenge! Papa Lee and Mama Lee battle it out in a trishaw competition and together, our Lee family give traditional wooden clogs a modern twist by adding their own unique designs! (重)这一集的《小城花样多》来到了马来西亚历史悠久的古城 - 马六甲！我们的李家兄弟玩起了父母的儿时玩具，马来陀螺！李爸爸和李妈妈也进行了一场激烈的三轮车大比拼！最后，李家成员各自发挥了自己的想象力，设计并亲手彩绘自己的木屐鞋！.

The next day, various fabricated rumours of Xiwen's relationship emerge. (PG)(第19集上)迅浩欲追求希文，希文即向迅浩表示已有男友。迅浩怀疑她口中的男友就是乘风，于是跟踪她。翌日公司流言满天飞。.

programme.title: 极件任务 Mission Delivery - EP 10
programme.desc: Our final mission is to deliver PIANOS! Besides being bulky, their delicate structure also poses a huge challenge for delivery. Let's check out the world's largest piano factory to see how pianos are packed for shipment, and what other services is to be rendered upon their arrival at their new home. (最后一集)音乐家能弹出一首首优美的旋律，除了靠天赋，还要具备好钢琴。这次的极件任务就是要运送钢琴！钢琴体积大，结构精细复杂，要怎么搬运它呢？抵达买主之后，还要提供哪些服务？对钢琴只懂皮毛的特派员葛凡是否能胜任呢？.

Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 邻里厨王 Neighbourhood Chef - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Mark and Kym arrive at Clementi this week. The theme of the week is duck, how varied will the dishes be and who will walk away with the crown? (重)第七集的比赛地点是金文泰，而这个星期的主题是"鸭肉"。.

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 40
programme.desc: (R) Frontline is a weekly investigative current affairs programme that aims to address issues closest to the hearts of Singaporeans. (重)民情、民生、民意！【前线追踪】紧跟社会民生步伐，追踪调查时事动态，探讨新加坡人关心的课题，针对问题的核心追根究底。.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 19
programme.desc: (Part 1) Xunhao goes all out to woo Xiwen, but she states that she already has a boyfriend. Xunhao suspects that Xiwen's boyfriend is Chengfeng, so he tails her to check. The next day, various fabricated rumours of Xiwen's relationship emerge. (PG)(重)(第19集上)迅浩欲追求希文，希文即向迅浩表示已有男友。迅浩怀疑她口中的男友就是乘风，于是跟踪她。翌日公司流言满天飞。.

programme.title: 健康密码 第二季 Health Code S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Boey Leung & doctor writer Ouyang Lin, this brand new season sees medical specialists talking about illnesses that affect your daily life. (重)知名医生作家欧阳林搭档梁宝仪主持的全新医疗保健节目，邀请专科医生解开疾病迷思，同时有营养师分享正确饮食观，让你轻松在生活中掌握健康密码。.

programme.title: 家和万事兴 Lee's Family Reunion - EP 144
programme.desc: (R) Passed down from generation to generation, the Li Ji Cake Shop has a hundred-year history to boast about. However, though the Li family look happy on the outside, there are conflicts aplenty behind closed doors. (PG)(重)《李记饼铺》代代相传已有百年，看似幸福美满的三代同堂，其实暗潮汹涌。老太爷李万世育有二子，长子再传留在饼店里帮忙，私生子再兴则流落在外，生活潦倒。主演：黄少褀饰高天诚，六月饰陈慧心，韩瑜饰李正男，方文琳饰罗秀琴。.

(PG)(重)依依拉振辉到公园去喝酒，见振辉闷闷不乐，猜想他情海起波澜，于是跑到118楼下，扬声叫玉叶下楼，吓得振辉急忙阻止。玉叶下楼来，依依宣告振辉已经决定和玉叶分手，转而跟她在一起，急得振辉如热锅上的蚂蚁。.

programme.desc: (R) This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. (重)在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

Na La took the opportunity to ask Liang Ge to name the culprit that got Liang Gui addicted to gambling and ended up with a huge debt then. Liang Ge was about to reveal when Tian Hua approaches... (PG)(重)大耳窿和手下到《粤香楼》向亮哥讨债，还大肆破坏茶楼，推倒桌椅。文广为救娜拉而受伤，亮哥非常内疚。娜拉趁机问亮哥当年是谁陷害梁贵染上赌瘾，害他欠下巨债的。梁哥正要说出此人身份时，却见天华迎面而来……。.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 19
programme.desc: (Part 2) The Huangs interrogate Chengfeng's relationship with Xiwen. Thereafter, Xiwen is transferred to Li'an's department. (PG))(第19集下)黄家上下盘问乘风，结果希文被调到立安部下。秀慧偶然遇到条件良好的富二代杨文隽，即安排贝儿与文隽见面，发觉二人有不少共同兴趣。.

programme.title: 节庆。风味 A Taste of Festival - EP 3
programme.desc: This episode, host introduces the characteristics of Cantonese & Peranakan CNY dishes, learns to make Roasted Chicken Stuffed with Prawns and Chef Benson demos on cooking Pork Knuckles with Red Fermented Bean Curd. Cooking methods of Nonya CNY dishes - Ayam Buah Keluak & Itek Sioh are also featured. 在这一集节目里，主持人将介绍广东和土生华人的年菜特色，例如功夫菜金龙百花鸡的做法，也请来厨师唐本陞示范烹煮南乳猪手。土生华人的年菜极富辛香酸辣的特色，节目将分享娘惹年菜如黑果焖鸡和酸甜卤鸭的烹调方法。.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 1
programme.desc: Zi Le was diagnosed with Tourette's syndrome since childhood. Adopted by An Qi and Da Wei, Zi Le has been helping An Qi to bake pastries. While delivering pastries for Chinese New Year, Zi Le accidentally bumps into a lady, causing his illness to act up. A video of this incident was posted online and seen by Yu Wen who suspects that Zi Le is her childhood friend. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(首播)子乐从小患有妥瑞氏症，从小被安琪和达威收养，帮安琪烘焙糕点。子乐送新年糕饼时，因不小心撞到妇女而病情发作，被人拍下放上网。雨汶见到，怀疑子乐是自己小时候的朋友……。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight

programme.title: 生产者 Food Producers S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: The show takes you to the origins of Malaysian food products, capturing how local manufacturing companies operate, survive and overcome problems. 这个节目将带您了解马来西亚食品的起源，捕捉当地制造企业的经营方式，生存和克服问题的方式。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 13
programme.desc: Wen Chao reported that Xuanwu was dead, and the weapon used to suppress the turtle was lost. Furious, Wen Ruohan ordered Wen Chao to find the weapon and obliterate Lotus Cove. (PG-些许暴力画面)温晁向温若寒汇报玄武已死，镇压妖兽的武器不翼而飞。温若寒大发雷霆，责令温晁找出镇压之物，屠杀莲花坞。.

programme.title: 破茧而出 Metamorphosis - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Power struggle within a notorious mafia gang led to the murder of several triad leaders. Before detectives Ouyang Li (Chen Hanwei) and Dylan (Terence Cao ) get to the killer, he was murdered. A series of chain murders occur where the dead are criminals. This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 Say It ! - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) What happens when Vivian Lai speaks English and Chua Enlai speaks Mandarin? Get ready for a load of laughter today as Vivian and Enlai sets up shop in a fashion bazaar and dry goods store respectively! (重)当赖怡伶说英语，蔡恩来又说华语时，会发生什么笑料呢？这一集的《好好说 慢慢讲》的挑战地点是艺术市集和干货市场！怡伶和蔡恩能顺利完成挑战吗？.

programme.desc: (R) Wen Guang was discharged from the hospital. Feng Zhu sees the mess in Tian Hua's house and decided to move in temporarily to take care of them. Tian Hua tried to reject saying it might be inconvenient as LuLu and Xiao Fang are not at home, but agreed knowing that Feng Zhu will stew soup for them. When the three of them had dinner together, Tian Hua lamented that it took 21 years of waiting for the three of them to finally have the chance to sit down for a meal together. (PG)(重)文广出院回家，凤珠见天华家一片凌乱，决定留下来暂住，以照顾父子俩。天华以陆露和小芳不在家，不方便为由拒绝，但听说凤珠会炖汤给他们吃，顿时难以抗拒，答应下来。三人一起吃晚餐，天华感叹他等了21年，一家三口才终于可以一起吃饭。.

(PG)(第20集上)公司传出贝儿每日有型男接送，围家口中说没事，当看见二人双双出现，心里不是滋味。以爱收到立安短讯，表示情人节有空相见，怎料立安妻Daphne家有白事，要他立即飞往新加坡。.

programme.title: 新语研究所 2 Fun With SINGnese S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Fun with SINGnese 2 continues to explore the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words. This episode discusses terms like Nonya, Ma Zu Gong Hou (another name for Amoy St), Chi Si Mao (taking the blame), and several words that mean to boast. 《新语研究所2》是富有趣味性的资讯节目，和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。为什么被冤枉俗称吃死猫？为什么吹嘘也叫做吹牛、车大炮或仙？娘惹的词源是什么？妈祖宫后在哪里？.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 2
programme.desc: When Zi Le delivers food to Yu Wen's house, Yu Wen's father, Hao Xiang, is unhappy about his delivery speed and wants to lodge a complaint. Zi Le tries to explain, but hastily overturns Hao Xiang's food instead. Yu Wen steps in to understand the situation upon noticing that her father is arguing with someone. Zi Le accidentally knocks down Yu Wen as he is just about to leave. (PG)子乐送外卖来到雨汶家，其父浩翔因心情不佳，不满子乐送餐太慢，称要去投诉他。子乐急于解释，却打翻了浩翔的食物。雨汶见父亲与人起争执，上前了解状况，子乐刚好要骑电板车离开，不小心撞倒雨汶……。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 14
programme.desc: Lotus Cove was ransacked and Jiang Fengmian and his wife were killed. Jiang Cheng was captured by Wen Chao. (PG-些许暴力画面)温晁血洗莲花坞，而江枫眠夫妇双双殒命。江澄也被温晁抓了。.

programme.title: 破茧而出 Metamorphosis - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Power struggle within a notorious mafia gang led to the murder of several triad leaders. Before detectives Ouyang Li (Chen Hanwei) and Dylan (Terence Cao ) get to the killer, he was murdered. A series of chain murders occur where the dead are criminals. This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

programme.title: 锁住味道 The Successor - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) In the last episode, the apprentices will be learning the traditional making of Tau Sar Piah. The grandson of Mr Lee Fanlong (90) persists to use the old way of making and bakes it with the traditional-styled oven to bring out the flaky, crisp and buttery texture of this pastry. The skills and spirit must be passed on. (重)（最后一集)锁住味道，最后一集要锁的是潮汕、台湾及本地常见的豆沙饼。简单的原料，加上纯熟的手艺，世代相传，大家吃到的，不止是一种来自家乡的口味，也是一种香浓亲切的情怀。新鲜出炉的豆沙饼，一粒粒色泽迷人，散发着香喷喷的诱人香味。这家豆沙饼老字号，目前由今年九十岁创办人李蕃龙先生的孙子，继续爷爷的坚持，用开业以来所操作的旧款煤气烤炉，天天准时烘烤富有潮州饼皮特色，同时具备西式奶油香气和酥脆可口的镇店之宝：豆沙饼。这个传统手工制作的秘方，坚持不能失传的老滋味，盼望着有心人前来学习这门手艺。.

programme.title: 你也是人类吗 Are You Human - EP 19

However, Nanxin gets more frustrated after meeting Nanxin III and starts to wonder what Lula really thinks about Nanxin III. Meanwhile, Xiaofeng's father is shocked to realize that his daughter is in love with a robot. 听到小凤爱的告白后, 南信3尝试了解和感觉。 但是南信见到南信3后更失落。 开始想吴博士是如何对待南信3。 另外小凤的爸爸很惊讶自己的女儿爱上一个机器人。.

programme.desc: Have you ever struggled to remove stubborn stains? This multipurpose stain cleaner might help. 不想让顽固污迹害你除污太费劲？此清洁膏也许能帮到你哦。.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Discover how you can wake up every morning glowing and refreshed as our hosts prove how a comfortable pillow is key for a good night's sleep. 好的枕头能让你一觉醒来精神抖擞、容光焕发。来，躺躺看吧!

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Do you want a solution to your household troubles? Find out how a good mop can do more with less effort. 好的拖把能让家务事半功倍！你也想要一支解决你拖地的烦恼吧.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Eating healthy goes a long way, watch on to find out how to incorporate this green diet smoothie into your meals. 想补充养分、膳食纤维同时维持身段？不妨喝蔬果饮料当代餐吧！.

programme.title: 加油！向未来 Eureka Moment China - EP 2
programme.desc: "Eureka Moment China" is an explosive and larger than life gameshow in which two couples go head to head testing their knowledge and coming face to face with a raft of dangerous stunts and wacky experiments. 《加油！向未来》是中央电视台推出的科学实验节目，由央视创造传媒有限公司制作。节目共11期，由撒贝宁、张腾岳主持，邓楚涵为解题人。每期节目明星将和观众代表一起，通过实验竞赛，为加油队和未来队赢取科学奖励，获胜队将赢得当期最终大奖（北极圈科考之旅）。.

programme.title: 有故事的店 Shop Stories - EP 3
programme.desc: Young man starts up a high-end hostel, strives to expand his business with no fear of hard work. Two secondary school friends open a Mexican burrito shop with their own aims in life. Two sisters based in Canada, came to Singapore to set up a non-toxic products shop to promote non-toxic lifestyle. 年轻人开设高档背包旅馆，不畏幸劳拓展品牌。两位中学同学合开墨西哥卷饼店，一为患癌父亲立志成业，一为放弃管理专业重新洗牌。在加拿大生活的姐妹，妹患有过敏症，两人返新开设无毒用品店，提倡无毒生活。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 4
programme.desc: Hulk tries to talk Pepper out of continuing her army training. Nevertheless, Pepper is still determined to go through with it to prove Hulk wrong about her. With the help of Jian Dong, Pepper even desperately tries to get close to Hulk again by stalking him and purposely hanging out at the places where he goes on a date with Officer Xinyi. However, her many attempts only lead to more comical outcomes and make her more sad to see Hulk and Officer Xinyi's relationship grow stronger. Hulk劝Pepper，不要为了自己当兵。Pepper却以为Hulk是要和自己合好的. 可后来Hulk送何欣怡回家，还亲了她，让Pepper大失所望。Pepper不肯放弃，继续追问建东，Hulk跟何欣怡明天去那里拍拖，她还是要出现在他们面前，不然Hulk会忘记自己的。建东烦不胜烦，大骂Pepper没骨气。回到军营后，Pepper化悲愤为力量，一心要拿到Best Recruit，结果弄巧反拙，笑话百出。.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 S1 As Long As You Live S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. 全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 1
programme.desc: In Singapore, when death comes calling for those without money nor family, an elderly Samaritan steps in to help with their funeral arrangements free of charge but he is not an undertaker. What prompts this senior citizen to lend a hand to strangers he has never met, no matter their race or creed? 当死亡到来的那天，一个人假如没有家人又有经济困难，他的后事该怎么办？ 在新加坡，就有一位年长者多年来免费替无依无靠的老人处理后事，但他并不是殡葬业者。究竟是什么原因让他不分种族、不分信仰，愿意为素未谋面的人倾心付出？.

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 7
programme.desc: Food Notes will open your eyes to many kimchi varieties you have never known! We also show you how the formidable aged kimchi, known locally as "Muguenji", transform ordinary fast food ingredients like sausages, luncheon meat and instant noodles into the beloved Budaejjigae in border town Uijeongbu! (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 112
programme.desc: Ep 83: Yiyuan thinks Haixiu has played her out when the media reports about the soy sauce again. Soon however, Yiyuan finds out that Guixi is the one who has betrayed her. Yiyuan is disappointed with how Guixi does not treat her like her flesh and blood. Ep 83: 传媒再次报道魔法酱油的事件，指ONE's食品偷走他人的酱油配方。艺苑认为是海秀所为，去向海秀兴师问罪，但暴料者其实是贵熙。艺苑觉得贵熙从来没有把她当女儿看待，对贵熙非常失望。.

programme.title: 守护家族 Save The Family - EP 84
programme.desc: (R) Xiuzi hears from Shanying that Haixiu wants to lie to help Yiyuan. Xiuzi informs Yuzhen of Haixiu's intention. Yuzhen wants Yiyuan to come clean with the truth and he will stand by her no matter what. Yiyuan says she will choose her career over love as Yuzhen will not be able to provide for her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀子到海秀的店，听善英说海秀要帮艺苑的事，觉得很不妥，赶紧去告诉宇真。宇真要艺苑别撒谎，诚心道歉，不管她之后沦落成什么样子，他都会对她负责。艺苑直言宇真没有力量给她她想要的，因此，爱情和事业之间，她选择事业。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 13
programme.desc: Ep 15 Prosecutor Sun is glad to hear that her son is going to have a kidney transplant but the dream is shattered when Zai Can halts the organ transplant when he suspects Li Huan fell unconscious due to assault, not accident. Ep 16:In order to save seven patients awaiting organ transplant, Zai Can suggests performing the organs transplant during the autopsy on Li Huan . Yuzhuo found a young eyewitness connected to Li Huan's case. Ep 15: 得知儿子将快能做肾脏移植，孙检察官高兴不已。可是宰璨怀疑李焕的脑死亡是凶手造成而不是意外的，停暂器官移植同意，令孙检察官希望破碎。Ep 16:为了救等待捐赠的七个病人，宰璨建议器官移植和尸检同时进行。 禹卓找到一名与李焕档案有关的证人。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 13

programme.title: 声音的抉择 Singing Choice - EP 6
programme.desc: A music variety where the singer will compose a song and find the right voice to sing it. Featuring singers such as Li Quan, Gary Chaw, Jam Hsiao, Kenji Wu, A-Niu etc. 《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲。.

programme.title: 怪食记 Weird Food Diaries - EP 6
programme.desc: In "Weird Food Diaries", avid foodie Rosalyn Lee (also known as Rozz) goes in search of Asia's most bizarre eats. Rozz eats away across Japan, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, Korea, Indonesia and the Philippines. Whether it's exotic street food or haute cuisine, Rozz is hungry to try it all! In this episode, there's never a dull moment in her weird food quest in the Vietnam. 在“怪食记"中，狂热的美食家Rosalyn Lee（也称为Rozz）正在寻找亚洲最奇异的食物。Rozz在日本，越南，柬埔寨，台湾，泰国，韩国，印度尼西亚和菲律宾各地旅行,并尝试当地街头奇异美食还是高级美食。在这一集中，她将带大家去越南品尝当地的奇怪的食物。.

programme.title: 偷天任务 Leverage - EP 13
programme.desc: The group of gangsters who is co-operating with Shili tries to steal gold bars, abducts Yisheng to make him assist them. Taijun guesses that this is another plot of Junheng's. 与世莉合作的那班匪徒试图自己窃取金条, 他们绑架了义声要他协助他们。太骏猜测这又是俊亨的阴谋。.

programme.title: 看见看不见的你 I See You - EP 13
programme.desc: In a final confrontation, Kai En and Shi Ping finally discover what happened to Kai En and her body. It is a tale of revenge that stretches back many decades. However, Shi Ping and Kai En might be too late to prevent Kai En from remaining a wandering spirit forever. 在最后的对决里，凯恩和世平终于发现凯恩遗失身体的真相。那都是好几十年前一宗复仇事故所引起的。可悲的是，世平和凯恩发现真相太迟了，他们也许来不及挽救凯恩从此变成孤魂野鬼的命运。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

In this episode, there's never a dull moment in her weird food quest in the Vietnam. 在“怪食记"中，狂热的美食家Rosalyn Lee（也称为Rozz）正在寻找亚洲最奇异的食物。Rozz在日本，越南，柬埔寨，台湾，泰国，韩国，印度尼西亚和菲律宾各地旅行,并尝试当地街头奇异美食还是高级美食。在这一集中，她将带大家去越南品尝当地的奇怪的食物。.

programme.title: 太阳的后裔 Descendants Of The Sun - EP 6
programme.desc: Liu Shizhen found out his ex-comrade had turned into an arms dealer and quickly asked Jiang Muyan to go back to the barracks. However Jiang's car got stranded at a cliff's edge but she was rescued by Liu in time. Their feelings for each other rekindled but not for long, as Liu was soon reassigned back to Korea. 刘时镇认出军火走私贩正是老友阿古斯，要姜暮研先回兵营。但暮烟的车子被卡在悬崖上，幸好刘时镇及时赶到救了姜暮研，两人的恋情复燃。刘时镇突然得被调回韩国，让暮烟再次失落。.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Eating healthy goes a long way, watch on to find out how to incorporate this green diet smoothie into your meals. 想补充养分、膳食纤维同时维持身段？不妨喝蔬果饮料当代餐吧！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Experience with our hosts how you can make cleaning easier than before with this extraordinary vacuum. 要让家居一尘不染那就得靠这位好帮手——吸尘器！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Discover how you can kick start a healthy lifestyle with this indoor exercise equipment. 足不出户、不用上健身房也能练身体？到底是怎么样的产品呢？.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Is there really a tumbler that can maintain the temperature of your hot and cold drinks for a long time? Find out how amazing this tumbler is as Jeremy fires a blowtorch to it. 真的有长效保冷以及储热的杯子吗？一起看看它有多神奇.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 Puzzle Masters - EP 3
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters" is a reality cum variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brain power. Wang Feng, Wang Yuhang and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Tao Jingying is invited as the resident guest of the programme. “最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑"邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力.节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、王昱行和鲍雲担任队长，陶晶莹则受邀当常驻嘉宾。.

programme.title: 太自游 Funtastic - EP 3
programme.desc: Funtastic is a travelogue with a difference, various artistes in each episode who will bring viewers to their favourite travel destinations. They will introduce unique local specialties and interact with the locals. What's more, the artistes will be put to the test to overcome obstacles along the journey or undertake activities they have never attempted before. 非一般的旅行，绝对刺激的新体验！李腾，许立桦，谢宛谕和李玲带你探索泰国鲜为人知的旅游宝地，教你如何尽情享受自由旅行之乐，成为一个真正的泰国自游达人！.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 11
programme.desc: This episode, Cui Fang learns how farmers use sawtooth oak to cultivate wild black fungus in Yunnan and also oyster farming in Philippines. Pornsak experiences wasabi harvesting in Japan and mussel harvesting in Australia. He is also in Thailand to harvest bamboo shoots and make sour bamboo shoots. 这一集节目中，林翠芳来到中国云南了解菌农如何利用麻栎木培育野生黑木耳。接着，她也前往菲律宾了解牡蛎的养殖。Pornsak在日本体验山葵的采收，并在澳大利亚参与贻贝的收成，他也到泰国采收竹笋，制作酸笋。.

programme.title: 奇异特工 Odd-upation - EP 6
programme.desc: Funeral Soul Guilding Song PerformerThe world is so big that nothing is to be surprised at a job which serves deceased as the main client. In contrast to undertaker, their job scope is to "lead" the soul of deceased. What are the requirements of this job and any taboo to be noted? Let us follow the host to Taiwan to explore more about this job. 世上无奇不有，就有这么一份工作，它的主要服务对象是往生者。民间普遍相信人死后会变成亡魂，而这份工作的主要职务就是将亡魂牵引到西方极乐世界去！这到底是怎样的一份工作？要具备什么条件才能胜任？请跟随奇异特工黄靖伦到台湾一探究竟。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 12
programme.desc: For months, the battle raged between pro-ISIS rebels and government forces. When the sounds of war and death finally subsided, large swathes of Marawi are in ruins and its displaced population are left to pick up the pieces. Facing up to the challenge is Dr Baimona Dimakuta, who is reaching out to help as many of her fellow countrymen as possible. Our host, Khai Saharom travels to Marawi - delivering vital medical equipment to help the good doctor in her outreach. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 5
programme.desc: This episode juxtaposes the experiences of a medical reconstructive patient and an aesthetic patient: one a teenage boy doing his third and final cleft lip and palate repair surgery, and another a young man doing his first liposuction to aid him in the process of losing weight through exercise. 越来越多男性因为外观问题而接受整形手术。一名进行过两次伤唇裂再造整形手术的青年即将接受最后一次手术。一名年轻男子也将首次接受抽脂术协助减肥。.

programme.title: 守护家族 Save The Family - EP 85
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan's father finds out that she was the one who orchestrated the soy sauce incident and not Zhiyuan. Yiyuan's father is disappointed in Yiyuan when she does not feel any remorse about making Zhiyuan the scapegoat. He thus removes her from her duties without first informing her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)艺苑的父亲通过开发室的资料获知偷取酱油和篡改资料的是艺苑，不是智沅。 艺苑觉得牺牲智沅对公司无害，一点都不觉得对不起智沅。父亲对艺苑失望，在没有通知艺苑的情况下，解除她的职务。.

programme.title: 守护家族 Save The Family - EP 86
programme.desc: (R) Zhufeng leaves home unexpectedly and cannot be found. Yuzhen and his family are worried sick. Wancai and Haocai have a huge quarrel over the incident. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)洙峰在大家没有注意的时候独自外出，过后忘记怎么回家。宇真和家人们找不到洙峰，急得像热锅上的蚂蚁，万才和浩才也为此闹得天翻地覆。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 14
programme.desc: Ep 17 Min Dajiu's father commited suicide in jail. He left behind a letter stating he was being wrongly accused. Dajiu seeks out Zai Can to re-investigate. The latter found out that Li Youfan was the prosecutor for the case.Ep 18:Hong Zhu and Zai Can are nearly killed in a deserted house while investigating Min Yishuo's case. Zai Can suspects Li Youfan faked evidence against the accused. Ep 17:明大九父亲在监狱自杀，在死前留下遗书，称自己是冤枉的。大九希望宰璨能让这起案子沉冤昭雪，宰璨得知这起案子是李侑凡负责审理.Ep 18:为了查明以硕之案，红珠和宰璨差点在一场火灾丟命。宰璨怀疑李侑凡制造伪证错抓了明以硕.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 14

He promises to help Chengjun's family with their financial problems and will also give Chengjun a good position in the company. His only condition is that Chengjun must marry Meizhu. Ep 61: 院长向慧珠解释志勋有一度想轻身，只有让他摆脱熙淑才可以让他振作起来。慧珠不接受院长的解释，说要向警方检举他。Ep 62: 光真突然到公司找成俊，说会帮他解决家里的财务问题，也会让他在公司大展拳脚，但条件是要他娶美珠。成俊表现得很淡定，到方家找美珠，说要跟她讨论剧本，还跟美珠用餐，令美珠以为成俊真的会接受父亲的条件。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 12
programme.desc: Starting from Singapore and travel around the world to explore the original source of ingredients of our food which we are familiar with in our daily life. To explore how these ingredients are affecting the food culture of different countries and Singapore and learn more about the source of origin. 从新加坡出发，以日常生活中随处可及的食材为主轴，找寻世界各地我们最为熟悉的食材种植地及食材加工地。再一探这些食材如何影响着各地甚至是我们的日常菜肴。带观众去看世界的同时，也了解我们熟悉的食材的来源地。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 37
programme.desc: Ep 41: Hengshun is shocked when Caili tells him that she is pregnant, but assures Caili that he will marry her. Zhen-ai decides to give up her relationship with Xuncai in consideration of Yingshan's feelings. Xuncai accuses Zhen-ai of placing more importance to her career.Ep 42: Zhexiong decides to sever ties with Caili when he is informed of her pregnancy. Yingshan finally tells Xuncai that Zhexiong is his biological father. Xuncai blames Yingshan for depriving him of fatherly love all thes Ep 41: 采莉说自己怀孕了，要亨顺跟她结婚。亨顺感到错愕，但表示一定会将采莉怀孕的事告诉哲雄，然后娶采莉。真爱知道就算再坚持，英善仍然不会让她嫁给勋才，于是跟勋才说她考虑到纽约进修，不结婚。勋才认为真爱重视工作和成就胜于重视他，对真爱失望。Ep 42: 亨顺和采莉向哲雄和琪南宣布采莉怀孕了。哲雄决定跟采莉断绝来往。勋才在公司里看到哲雄年轻时的照片，发现跟英善收藏的一模一样。勋才质问英善。英善终于向勋才坦白哲雄是他的父亲。勋才埋怨英善害他那么多年来没有感受到父爱。.

programme.title: 戏子 The Entertainer - EP 5
programme.desc: Xihao returns to Busan again to persuade Hena to rejoin the band. He asks Gelin to also help persuade Hena. Kaier also joins Xihao in Busan to persuade Hena after he sees the gifted talent in lyric writing of Hena. Gelin tells him the story behind Hena's unjust prosecution. 锡浩为了说服河那回到乐队，再一次到釜山，也请求格林帮忙劝河那回队。凯尔看到了河那的作词天赋也追到釜山，要和锡浩一起说服赵河那加入乐队。格林告诉他有关河那冤屈被控告的背后故事。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 47
programme.desc: Ep 63: Tongxi begs Guangzhen to send Guifen to the hospital when she falls sick. Guangzhen takes the chance to force Tongxi to get Changxu to amend her will. Changxu revises her will according to Guangzhen's instructions.Ep 64: Zhixun almost suffers a breakdown again when Xishu forces him to study. Xiangxie, Chengxun and Huizhu discuss their next step. They are shocked when they realise that Changzhu has overheard their conversation and hence knows that Xishu is not his mother. Ep 63: 贵芬病倒。彤熙要求光真送她到医院去。光真要彤熙先说服昌旭更改遗嘱，他才会送贵芬到医院去。昌旭在光真面前更改遗嘱，要光真放了贵芬和彤熙。Ep 64: 熙淑在全家人面前逼志勋读书。眼看志勋被熙淑逼得喘不过气来，享燮、成勋和慧珠聚在一起讨论是否该继续隐瞒孩子们的事，他们的对话却被昌洙听到了。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 13
programme.desc: In a remote part of Ladakh not even listed on Google Maps, is an unknown village in Leh that is completely devoid of electricity. The remoteness and rugged mountain terrain makes laying conventional power lines impossible. Host Paul Foster is on a special mission to deliver a micro-grid energy system to the people of this village. Carrying a fragile and unwieldy solar panel for days up the unforgiving terrain is a challenge that even the super fit Paul will struggle with. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 6
programme.desc: There is no limit to the type of cases that a plastic surgeon has to deal with - from aesthetic requests to birth defects, and sometimes - even trauma patients. In this episode, we follow two children born with Apert syndrome, and a man who needs urgent surgery after breaking his jaw in a bad fall. 除了应付美容需求的客户，整形外科专家姚国龙医生也得经常为先天性缺陷或创伤病患进行手术。这一集两名亚伯氏症的孩童以及一名因跌断下颌而急需进行手术的男子找上了姚医生。.

programme.title: 妇仇者联盟 Avengers' Social Club - EP 7

Taoxi injured Meishu's husband, Bai Yingbiao on purpose so that he could not assault Meishu.Ep 8:Meishu invites Taoxi and Zhenhui to her house. Her husband despises Taoxi and reminds Meishu to be more discerning when making friends.The "Bok-ja" club members suspect that Liang Shanwan and Bai Yingbiao are taking bribes. Ep 7:复仇者俱乐部成员接到一张四人第一次聚在一起商议复仇的照片，感到怀疑。桃熙故意弄伤李美淑的老公白英表，以便阻止他对美淑暴力。Ep 8:美淑邀请桃熙与贞慧到她家，老公瞧不起桃熙并劝美淑带眼识人.复仇者俱乐部团圆们怀疑洪尚万与白英表贿赂。.

programme.desc: Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be before hand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. “谁来晚餐”是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露。.

programme.title: 极境之旅 Forbidding No More - EP 4
programme.desc: Iran is a country with long history and mysterious national customs. It is also a Middle Eastern country that has been viewed as dangerous by some western governments. The host of "Forbidding No More", Darren Lim, embarks on his maiden journey to this mysterious land, what extreme experiences are awaiting ahead? 文明古国伊朗虽然拥有悠久的历史和神秘的民族风情；可是，它同时也是一个被国际社会贴上各种极端标签的中东国家。《极境之旅》主持人林明伦踏上这片神秘的中东沃土，等着他的会是怎样的一趟极境旅程？.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 38
programme.desc: Ep 43: Jin Shan volunteers to stay with Jin Guanglie and pleads with Guanglie to set Huizhu free. Guanglie finally realises that he has inflicted a lot of harm on Jin Shan. Xuncai tells Zhexiong that he only regards him as a boss.Ep 44: Guanglie decides to go overseas for treatment and requests for Hengkui to take care of Huizhu and Jin Shan. Xuncai quarrels with Yingshan for her interference in his relationship with Zhen-ai. Ep 43: 金山拖着行李到金光烈的诊所，说愿意跟金光烈生活，要金光烈放过惠珠。金光烈终于意识到自己带给金山非常大的伤害。哲雄跟勋才见面。勋才表示只把哲雄当父亲看待。Ep 44: 金光烈决定到国外接受治疗，临走前拜托亨奎好好地照顾惠珠和金山。勋才如英善所愿搬回家，但因不满英善拆散他和真爱，与英善发生口角。英善伤心。.

programme.title: 戏子 The Entertainer - EP 6
programme.desc: Xihao feels vespaired after Zhouhan tells him the truth of Hena being wronged for sexual harassment and who the real culprit is. Xihao makes the decision to dissolve the band because of financial problems and KTOP's hindrance. The members all leave in sadness after hearing the problems the company is facing. 州汉告诉锡浩河那被冤枉的性骚扰真相和真正的罪人后，锡浩感到十分绝望。因为资金问题与KTOP的阻碍，申锡浩做出了解散乐队的决定。当锡浩告诉大家公司遇到的问题要解散时，成员听了都难过地离开。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 48
programme.desc: Ep 65: Chengjun hands over a thumb drive to Chengxun and asks him to hand the thumb drive to reporters should something happen to him.
